channel.title: Issue's with wielding godsword [pi] 317 reloaded cache
channel.description:
This is the problem I'm getting when weilding godswords, wasnt quite sure what to search as far as a guide to fix this because I dont know exactly what you would call this. Any help would be great, thanks guys. Also I'm not sure If this is server sided issue or client side, I think its server sided because I ran this source with a different client and had a similar issue.
[img]http://i41.servimg.com/u/f41/13/11/10/08/glitch10.png[/img]

item.title: Issue's with wielding godsword [pi] 317 reloaded cache
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

NSrepa:

any idea what the correct number would be for the animation

It isn’t in a 317 Cache by default.

Read full topic

item.title: Issue's with wielding godsword [pi] 317 reloaded cache
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

I’m no expert at this, but I’ll give it a shot. I’d say it’s one of two possibilities, either you just put in the wrong number of the animation, or you did the same thing, but in the cache or wherever the animation would be stored.

Read full topic
